meanings.sent1: The knubbiest rock in the garden was rough to touch.
meanings.sent2: The tree bark felt knubbiest where the branches met the trunk.
meanings.sent3: The knubbiest potato in the bag made the chef chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her knubbiest bracelet jingled with every movement.
meanings.sent5: The knubbiest surface resembled a bumpy road under his fingertips.

meanings.definition: The most knubby or having the most knubs
meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed the knubbiest from his collection of stones.
meanings.sent2: The farmer selected the knubbiest to plant for the next harvest.
meanings.sent3: The knubbiest on the sweater caught the attention of his friends.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the knubbiest stood out among the smooth pebbles.
meanings.sent5: She found the knubbiest fascinating, each one a unique shape and size.
